metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7441 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The modern style negotiation in Network Block Device (nbd-server) 2.9.22 through 3.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (root process termination) by (1) closing the connection during negotiation or (2) specifying a name for a non-existent export.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7441` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

nbd-client - 1:3.7-1
nbd-server - 1:3.7-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nbd package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:3.7-1').
